description: I don't have all permissions required to run that command here! Please check the server and channel permissions to make sure I have the following permissions.

oldPrefixUsed.title: Slash Commands Update
description: {{COM:bot.name}} now uses **Slash Commands**! Try it by typing {{HELP_COMMAND}}!
If you don't see any slash commands listed for {{COM:bot.name}}:
1. Check that you have the **Use Application Commands** permission in this channel.

cannotGiveRole.title: Cannot Give Role!
description: Any role that the bot has to give must be below {{BOT}}'s highest role.
Additional Note: {{BOT}} must have the `Manage Roles` permission to give roles to users.

errorEmbeds.cooldownHit: You can only run this command {{AMOUNT}} time(s) every {{INTERVAL}}. Please wait before attempting this command again.
errorEmbeds.devOnly: This action can only be done by developers.
errorEmbeds.levelingRewardAlreadyHasRole: The role {{ROLE}} is already a reward for reaching level {{LEVEL}}!
errorEmbeds.levelingRewardDoesNotHaveRole: The role {{ROLE}} is not a reward for reaching level {{LEVEL}}!
errorEmbeds.levelingRewardDoesNotHaveRoleId: The role id {{ROLE_ID}} is not a reward for reaching level {{LEVEL}}!
errorEmbeds.levelingRewardDoesNotHaveRoles: There are no role rewards for level {{LEVEL}}!
errorEmbeds.rawAPIInteractionDataReceived: Please reinvite the bot with the guild scope.
errorEmbeds.roleManaged: Please give a role that is not managed by an external service!
errorEmbeds.quoteChannelDeleted: The quote channel has been deleted! Please set a new one using the {{EDIT_CHANNEL_COMMAND}} command.
errorEmbeds.noQuoteChannel: No quote channel has been set for this server! Please set one using the {{EDIT_CHANNEL_COMMAND}} command.
errorEmbeds.noPermissionToSendToChannel: I don't have permission to send messages to {{CHANNEL_MENTION}}! Please contact an administrator to change my permissions.
errorEmbeds.noPunctuation: Shouldn't you have learned proper punctuation at school?
errorEmbeds.joinRoleAlreadyExists: The role {{ROLE}} is already set as a join role!
errorEmbeds.joinRoleDoesNotExist: The role {{ROLE}} is not set as a join role!
errorEmbeds.joinRoleIdDoesNotExist: The role ID {{ROLE_ID}} is not set as a join role!
errorEmbeds.noJoinRoles: There are no join roles set for this server!

permissions.MentionEveryone: Mention Everyone, Here, and All Roles

footers.whyPremium: Premium helps us support and maintain the bot!
footers.joinSupport: Please join our support server if you have any questions.
